translation: Those for whose sake we desire kingdom, enjoyments, and pleasures stand here in battle, having renounced life and wealth.
commentary: 1.33 whose of whose? Arthe sake? desired (is) desired? Nah by us? kingdom kingdom? Bhogas enjoyment? Sukhani pleasures? f and? And they? Ime these? standing stand? in battle in battle? Pranaan life? Leaving having abandoned? Wealth wealth? f and.No Commentary.
